quest.name: Absolution
journal: Sid seems strangely at peace, for a change.

Countess Ystride's missive has arrived at last. You, Sidurgu, and Rielle are to meet with her in the western highlands, that you might conduct your trial by combat far from prying eyes. Before you depart, Sidurgu tells you that Rielle wishes to say a few words.

As Rielle thanks you for the time you shared together, you are struck by how much she has changed. The quiet, unassuming girl you first met has grown tremendously, shaped by her experiences on the road and the knights who have kept her safe. Sidurgu seems to see it as well, regarding her with a newfound respect. With nothing left to discuss, the knight bids you journey to Twinpools together and settle matters once and for all.

Desperate to find absolution in the death of her daughter, Countess Ystride quickly discards all pretense and commands wave after wave of Temple Knights to kill Rielle. Eventually, she attempts to carry out the deed herself, but you and Sidurgu manage to subdue her and kill her remaining knights. The dark knight stands poised to strike her down as well, but relents, reasoning that for all her crimes, she is still Rielle's mother. However, the countess declares that she will never stop hunting the girl, for it is the will of the Fury.

Perhaps, in some corner of her heart, she knew it could only end like this. Rielle steps forward and tells Ystride that she will pray for her one last time, that she might find peace in Halone's halls. Grudgingly, Sidurgu readies his sword once more, and Rielle begins to administer the last rites to her mother. As the blade meets her neck, Ystride looks to her daughter, and for a moment, the hatred which consumed her is nowhere to be seen... After a time, Rielle says simply that you will return to Ishgard. Sparing a final glance for her mother, she turns and walks away.

In the end, it would seem that Rielle would rather remain in the company of Sidurgu─provided he continues to be more honest with her. He responds to her ultimatum in typical fashion, prompting you and Rielle to share a laugh. The two intend to remain in Ishgard for a time, as there are doubtless others in need of their help. But for whom will you stand? For your friends? For Eorzea? Or perhaps, for the one within who is ever waiting to take the reins...

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu once you have met the following requirements:
※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Stormblood must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Countess Ystride's missive arrived while you were away. We're to meet her in the western highlands─away from prying eyes.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: She's gone to great lengths to conceal her husband's deeds, so it comes as no surprise that she'd prefer to settle this in secret.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Forename, I...I don't know what's waiting for us out there.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: But if aught should happen to me...pray keep Rielle safe.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Right, then. I believe she wanted a word with you before we left.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle wanted to speak with you before we set out for the western highlands.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: We wouldn't have made it this far without you, Forename.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I want you to know that I'm truly grateful for the time we shared.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: You, Sidurgu, and Fray taught me so much about the world. About what it means to fight for another...and what it means to fight for yourself.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: We're going to finish this together. The three of us.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...Naught else to say, really.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: To Twinpools, then. Let's not keep the countess waiting.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Best not neglect your preparations. I doubt the Temple Knights will let us come back for supplies.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: ...I'm ready to see her.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I wonder how many men will she bring to kill the “abomination”...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Seems we're early. Well, it's not as though I have pressing business elsewhere... Enjoy a moment's respite with me, Forename?

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: You came. A wise decision.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: You have his eyes. His nose, his lips...

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Every time I look at you, I see more and more of him. And it sickens me.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle is not her father!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: You had no right to punish her for what he did!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Who are you to stand in judgment of me!? I have every right!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: I bore that monster into this world, and by the Fury, I shall send it to the seventh hell!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: If you're so bloody fond of it, you can follow it there!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: It's just us now─no one else. Remember Fray's conjury.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Protect us, and we'll protect you.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Right, then.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Raaaaaargh!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Damn you! Get...get out of my way!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Why!? Why!?

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Why do you care so much what happens to it!?

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...You're not the first person to ask me that.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Once, you might have understood...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: For everything that you are─that you have done─you are still her mother.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Go. We shall not meet again.

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: ...Oh, but we will. We will, knight! I promise you that!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: I will follow you to the ends of the world, if I must. So long as she...so long as it lives, I must!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Don't you see, you fool!? The Fury wills it! The Fury wills it!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle?

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: How great your love for Her. Far greater than any you ever bore me.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: For a long time, I prayed for forgiveness. I prayed you would take me in your arms and hold me as you did before...

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: But I know that shall never come to pass.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: ...I will pray for you, Mother, that you might find peace in Her halls.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: O Halone, receive of us this woman, Your humble servant. Raise her up to Your bosom and grant her glory everlasting...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...So what now?

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: We go back to Ishgard.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Together.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...As you wish.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: And so falls House Caulignont...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: It all seems so simple in retrospect...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: The moment I stopped trying to find the answer, there it was.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: All that anger, all that rage...born of a fervent desire to protect that which we hold most dear.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: ...So you are still committed to your path, then.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...And you, if you will have me.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: You'll need to talk to me more. And listen...

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: I can't stand the silence, you know.

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: There's no shame in sharing the weight, Sid. We can bear it together─for ourselves, and for others.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Right, then.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: The two of us will manage on our own, Forename.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: There may be others who know of Rielle's heritage...but if they come, we will be ready.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Granted, we could simply leave Ishgard, but that would leave the people at the mercy of the powers that be. I cannot do that now...and neither can Rielle, I think.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: We all need a cause, Forename. So what will yours be? For whom will you stand?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: For whom will you stand?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: My friends.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: For Eorzea.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Myself.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: And so you shall.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...It stirs within you, yearning to be free.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Look within your heart and decide what sort of womanman you would be. But mark me well, Forename. Without a flame, the abyss will take you.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: To walk the path is to suffer. To sacrifice. Justice demands no less.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: But we must never lose sight of why we chose to walk it.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: ...Gods help me, those moogles were onto something, weren't they?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This concludes the dark knight quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Heavensward. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
※ FINAL FANTASY XIV: Stormblood must be registered to your service account.
※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Once you have done so, the next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu.

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle!? Where are you!? RIELLE!

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Sid! I can't, I...

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Go forth, brave knights of Ishgard! The Fury watch over and protect you!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: So much for a fair fight...

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Rielle, Forename─stay close to me!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Be without fear in the face of the heretics! Forward, I say! Forward!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Just how many did she bring!?

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: Stand your ground! Let them come to us!

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: No... No more. Enough!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Forward! Bring me her head! The Fury wills it!

dialogue.name: RIELLE
dialogue.text: Have you no mercy, Mother!?

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: I told you never to call me that!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: You were given a chance! You could've stayed in your cell!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Monster! Abomination! Death will be a mercy!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Kill them! Kill them all! All of you, attack!

dialogue.name: SIDURGU
dialogue.text: You...will not...harm her!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: O Halone, see us to victory! Grant me the strength to strike down this foul creature!

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Pray forgive me my sins...for laying down with Your enemies...

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Help me...to cleanse my soul of this taint...

dialogue.name: YSTRIDE
dialogue.text: Render unto it Your judgment! Unmake this monstrosity!
